alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 8:31PM MDT until August 05 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL ELBERT AND CENTRAL LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 830 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Limon, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Elbert and central Lincoln Counties just south of Limon and Hugo. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
